TextView.android:text: Minimum qualification for admission to Diploma Courses in Food Production and Food and Beverage Service is a clear pass in the final examination of 10+2 system of Senior Secondary Examination or its equivalent, with English. A decision of the institute regarding the eligibility shall be final. Even after admission to the Institute if an applicant is at a later date found ineligible on account of supplying false information of false testimonials or for having suppressed any material information, his / her admission will be cancelled and the fee paid will also be forfeited.
